episodes.title: Rude
episodes.plot: Sandi Toksvig and Alan Davies are joined by John Barrowman, Aisling Bea and Phill Jupitus for a rather rude edition of the quite interesting panel show.

episodes.title: Ruff and Reddy
episodes.plot: In this edition of the panel show Sandi Toksvig takes a look at ruffs and red things with Alan Davies, Tom Allen, Susan Calman and Zoe Lyons.

episodes.title: Road and Rail
episodes.plot: Sandi Toksvig gets railroaded into a road and rail themed episode, with Alan Davies, Aisling Bea, Cally Beaton and Holly Walsh.

episodes.title: Restaurants
episodes.plot: Sandi Toksvig invites Phill Jupitus, Sara Pascoe, Mark Watson and Alan Davies to join her in the QI restaurant for this edition of the quite interesting programme.

episodes.title: Rubbish
episodes.plot: This week host Sandi Toksvig talks rubbish with Alan Davies, Bridget Christie, Johnny Vegas and Holly Walsh.

episodes.title: Ridiculous
episodes.plot: Sandi Toksvig invites regular panellist Alan Davies and guests Maisie Adam, David Mitchell and Holly Walsh to join her in ridiculing a ridiculous edition of the panel show.

episodes.title: Revolutions
episodes.plot: Panellists Gyles Brandreth, Susan Calman, Jessica Fostekew and Alan Davies are in revolt in a revolting edition of the popular panel show that is all about revolutions. Sandi Toksvig attempts to prevent them getting in a spin.

episodes.title: Reflections
episodes.plot: Sandi Toksvig reflects on this and that in an edition themed around reflections, with Alan Davies, Zoe Lyons, Joe Lycett and Liza Tarbuck.

episodes.title: Radioactive
episodes.plot: Sandi Toksvig shelters from the fallout of a hot edition of the programme focusing on radioactive. With guests Shazia Mirza, Joe Lycett, Josh Widdicombe and Alan Davies.

episodes.title: Rest & Recreation
episodes.plot: Sandi Toksvig indulges in a bit of well-earned R&R with Alan Davies, Susan Calman, Stephen K. Amos and Lou Sanders.

episodes.title: Roaming
episodes.plot: Sandi Toksvig goes roaming with Alan Davies, Sara Pascoe, Josh Widdicombe and Benjamin Zephaniah.

episodes.title: VG
episodes.plot: Sandi Toksvig presents a selection of the best moments from across the R series. With panellist supremo Alan Davies and an array of guests.

episodes.title: Rejoice!
episodes.plot: It's Christmas, so it is time to rejoice with Sandi Toksvig and guests Chris McCausland, Justin Moorhouse, Holly Walsh and Alan Davies.

episodes.title: R Animals
episodes.plot: Sandi Toksvig discusses animals which start with the letter R with her guests Tom Allen, Ed Gamble, Maggie Aderin-Pocock and Alan Davies.

episodes.title: Rogue
episodes.plot: This week, Sandi Toksvig goes Rogue with her guests Bill Bailey, Jack Carroll, Olga Koch and Alan Davies.

episodes.title: Random
episodes.plot: Bill Bailey, Daliso Chaponda, Sally Phillips and Alan Davies attempt to come up with some interesting answers as Sandi Toksvig asks a random selection of questions.

episodes.title: Rock 'n' Roll
episodes.plot: Sandi Toksvig talks about rocks, rolls and rock 'n' roll with Bill Bailey, Katy Brand, Eshaan Akbar and regular panellist Alan Davies.

episodes.title: VG: Part 2
episodes.plot: A selection of the best moments from the R series of QI, hosted by Sandi Toksvig with Alan Davies and their guests.
